meanings: (S) anyway, (S) anyhow, in any case, (결국) after all
노래방 I'll get this over with first.

meanings.meaning: You pays your money and (you) takes your choice

vlive.korean: 어차피 우리 분식밖에 없으니깐 많이들 마셔둬요... We'll have to eat snacks anyway, so drink a lot... 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : TO DO X TOMORROW X TOGETHER 2020 - EP.7
vlive.english: We'll have to eat snacks anyway, so drink a lot...

vlive.korean: [어차피 언제 쳐도] 겨드랑이 치는 걸 보여드리는 건 조금 그렇지 않나? [No matter when he does it] Isn't it weird for me to do that on V LIVE? 듣기 View video V PICK! : [MONSTA X] 겨드랑이가 있는데 왜 치지를 못하니.. 채씨의 <겨드랑이 치기 좋은 날>🐢 (Hyungwon's how to remove swelling out)
vlive.english: [No matter when he does it] Isn't it weird for me to do that on V LIVE?

vlive.korean: 맞아 - 어차피 하트 이렇게 해서 조심히 찍으면 하트 모양 그대로 있지 않을까? That's right. - It's like a heart here, so if I stamp it carefully, won't it be like a heart? 듣기 View video NU'EST : 뉴이스트와 스푼즈가 함께하는 Special V LIVE [THE NU'STORE]
vlive.english: That's right. - It's like a heart here, so if I stamp it carefully, won't it be like a heart?

vlive.korean: 어차피 분해되면 다 똑같이 당 아닌가요? Won't it all break down into sugar particles? 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : 스윗한 태현이의 스윗한거 만들기
vlive.english: Won't it all break down into sugar particles?

vlive.korean: 오케이! [재빠르게 썰기에 돌입] - 어차피 저는 할 것도... [Started cutting] - Okay. - I don't have anything to do. 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : TO DO X TOMORROW X TOGETHER 2020 - EP.4
vlive.english: [Started cutting] - Okay. - I don't have anything to do.

examples.korean: He said he didn’t want the job anyway, but that’s just sour grapes. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 어차피 자기도 그 직장을 원한 것은 아니었다고 말했지만 그것은 그냥 오기였다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He said he didn’t want the job anyway, but that’s just sour grapes. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Life is subject to decay. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 인생이란 어차피 시들게 되어 있다. (서양속담, 인생속담) 명언/속담
examples.english: Life is subject to decay. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: I never think of the future - it comes soon enough. (Albert Einstein) 듣기 Add to Wordbook 나는 미래에 대해 생각하는 법이 없다. 어차피 곧 닥치니까. (알버트 아인슈타인, 시간명언) 명언/속담
examples.english: I never think of the future - it comes soon enough. (Albert Einstein) Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Never explain--your friends do not need it and your enemies will not believe you anyway. (Elbert Hubbard) 듣기 Add to Wordbook 설명하지마라--친구라면 설명할 필요가 없고, 적이라면 어차피 당신을 믿으려 하지 않을 테니까. (엘버트 허버드, 친구명언) 명언/속담
examples.english: Never explain--your friends do not need it and your enemies will not believe you anyway. (Elbert Hubbard) Add to Wordbook
